Epochs to Table

Converts mne.Epochs data to Orange.data.Table data.

Inputs

  • Epochs

Outputs

  • Table

Use

  1. After the convert process Epochs converted will be displayed.
  2. Channel to convert - Name of channel to convert to Table data
